samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: The example describes key features of Vue textbox such as a floating label, input group, placeholder, validation states, sizing, types, and more.

samples.name: Multiline TextBox
samples.description: The example exposes a Vue Multiline TextBox (textarea). It helps to render address, feedback, and more in a form with customizable rows and columns.

samples.name: Two-way Binding
samples.description: The Vue TextBox component supports two-way data binding using the v-model attribute of Vue directive. It helps to achieve sync with data in the DOM.
